title: Portfolio
text:
This is a list containing my prior work experience, coding projects, and research experience. Work experiences involve websites for clients, while personal projects are attempts to expand my knowledge about web programming, virtual reality, or or prototyping.
NOTE: Some portfolio items are cross-referenced between work experiences, projects, and research experiences. In other words, some items may appear more than once.


### Three.js Guide
3D web graphics lessons
### Unity Physics Basics
Understanding triggers and collisions

title: Hello
text:
My name is Ryan Kim. Pleasure to meet ya!
I’m someone with a robust interest in virtual reality, urban simulation, web application development, and human-computer interaction.
If you’re ever in the need for a VR developer, game designer, or front-end engineer who can provide the necessary skills to develop your simulation/web projects, websites, or web applications, I’m the right person for the job.
